meanings.definition: The condition of having the upper front teeth extend over the lower front teeth when the mouth is closed.
meanings.sent1: Her overbites made it difficult for her to chew properly.
meanings.sent2: The dentist recommended braces to correct her overbites.
meanings.sent3: His overbites were so pronounced that he could almost use them as a shelf for tiny objects.
meanings.sent4: The overbites in the fence symbolized the divide between the two neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The overbites in the puzzle pieces made it challenging to fit them together.
